text: Zuwa alyo Daudi nakalonga, “Munhu yoneche wone yawatowe Wayebusi, yakole mli vikolola vya mazi leka kuwatowa awo wapoka walingiwhana na walichete na wohambe walole, wawele ndo wang'honyo wa Daudi.” Ndo mina wanhu wangulongaga, “Wohambe walole na walichete hambe wenjile kuli ng'handa ya mndewa.”
